alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 26 at 2:38AM MDT until March 27 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches at lower elevations with 3 to 8 inches possible in the mountains. * WHERE...Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult due to slippery road conditions and reduced visibility, especially over mountain passes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County
